value.title: European Commission Proposes Taking Away the Cops' Big Boy Surveillance Machine
value.excerpt: The EU is giving the U.S. a run for its money with privacy regulation, and now they’ve upped the ante with a dynamo of a proposal: banishing AI systems that violate “fundamental rights,” with a special place in hell for law enforcement using real-time biometric identification.

value.title: Streaming Solutions Expand to Assist Healthcare Providers
value.excerpt: NEW YORK, April 21, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- The pandemic has had several major side effects on the healthcare industry, helping to accelerate the digitization of healthcare services across the board. Digital healthcare functions are largely based on the electronic health record (EHR),

value.title: Corporate Tech Leaders Are Mixed on EU Artificial Intelligence Bill
value.excerpt: Some corporate technology leaders say a proposed clampdown by European regulators on the use of artificial intelligence will run up costs and stifle innovation, just as companies are starting to unlock its potential.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) & advanced Machine Learning (ML) Market Size, Share, Development Analysis, Progression Status by 2028
value.excerpt: The global Artificial Intelligence (AI) & advanced Machine Learning (ML) market size is expected to reach USD 471.39 Billion at a steady CAGR of 35.2% in 2028, according to latest analysis by Emergen Research.

value.title: Machine learning helps researchers decipher the Dead Sea Scrolls
value.excerpt: In a new study, researchers used machine learning to study the Great Isaiah Scroll, which some researchers hypothesized was penned by two scribes with similar handwriting styles.

value.title: Blockchain startup Digital Asset nabs $120M to knock down data silos
value.excerpt: Digital Asset, a company developing tools to enable enterprises to take advantage of digital ledgers, has raised $120 million.

value.title: NVIDIA Sets AI Inference Records, Introduces A30 and A10 GPUs for Enterprise Servers
value.excerpt: NVIDIA today announced that its AI inference platform, newly expanded with NVIDIA ® A30 and A10 GPUs for mainstream servers, has achieved record-setting performance across every category on the latest release of MLPerf.

value.title: Google Ethical AI Group’s Turmoil Began Long Before Public Unraveling

value.title: Google rolls out new AI-powered features for Meet
value.excerpt: Google's newest improvements to Meet include Autozoom, which automatically zooms in on participants to keep them in-camera.

value.title: Self-driving car sensor startup Luminar hires Tesla, Intel veterans
value.excerpt: Self-driving car sensor startup Luminar Technologies Inc on Wednesday said it had hired Tesla Inc and Intel Corp veterans for legal and investor relations positions.

value.title: How IBM Watson is helping clients build trust in data, models and processes
value.excerpt: Through my role as Chief AI Officer at IBM, I have the privilege of working with organizations to ensure they have a holistic approach to AI. We do that by helping businesses design AI strategies, set guiding principles, and infuse responsible AI products with intent and purpose throughout their business.

value.title: Breakingviews - Capital Calls: Robots and fund managers can get along
value.excerpt: LONDON (Reuters Breakingviews) - BENIGN OVERLORDS. Fears of robots replacing humans in the asset management industry may be overstated. That’s one lesson from a relatively richly valued deal announced on Tuesday to bring artificial intelligence specialist Insig AI onto the London market.

value.title: Treatment.com - Building the Smartest Artificial Intelligence (AI) System for Healthcare
value.excerpt: Treatment.com saw the opportunity to provide more accurate results backed by powerful Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology. They created easy and supportive digital tools to help people make important decisions and improve their health.

value.title: Hive’s cloud-hosted machine learning models draw $85M
value.excerpt: Hive wants to encourage machine learning in the cloud by allowing enterprises to access hosted ML models via APIs.

value.title: Signia Reveals Hearing Aids With Wireless Earbud Technology And Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Signia is a major hearing aid manufacturer that has developed the Active and Active Pro hearables that bring the advantages offered by true wireless earbuds along with advanced hearing loss technologies.

value.title: CEO of Softbank-backed SambaNova explains the firm's approach to artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Many companies are struggling to figure out how to hire teams in order to deploy artificial intelligence technology, says Rodrigo Liang, co-founder and CEO of SambaNova Systems.

value.title: EU seeks global standards for AI, civil rights groups fret
value.excerpt: The European Commission on Wednesday announced tough draft rules on the use of artificial intelligence, including a ban on most surveillance, in an attempt to set global standards for a key technology dominated by China and the United States.
